titles.ar: باب مَنْ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 25 – One who bequeaths with ‘something’ from his wealth

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/68)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَمْرٍو عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّ

text: هُ سُئِلَ عَنْ رَجُلٍ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ فَقَالَ الشَّيْ‏ءُ فِي كِتَابِ عَلِيٍّ ( عليه السلام ) وَاحِدٌ مِنْ سِتَّةٍ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Abu Abdullah, from Muhamamd Bin Amro, from Jameel, from Aban,

(It has been narrated) from Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup> having been asked about a man who bequeathed with ‘something’ from his wealth. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The ‘something’ in the Book of Ali<sup>asws</sup> is one from six (1/6)’.
en.sarwar: 1. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn abu ‘Abd Allah from Muhammad ibn ‘Amr from Jamil from Aban who has narrated the following: “Ali ibn al-Husayn, ‘Alayhim al-Salam, was asked about the case of a man who made a will about something of his legacy. He (the Imam) said, ‘According to the book of Ali, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, it is one-sixth.”’

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مرسل - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/68)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ أَوْ غَيْرِهِ عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: سُئِلَ عَنْ رَجُلٍ أَوْصَى بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ مَالِهِ قَالَ الشَّيْ‏ءُ فِي كِتَابِ عَلِيٍّ ( عليه السلام ) مِنْ سِتَّةٍ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ibn Fazaal, or someone else, from Jameel, from Aban,

(It has been narrated) from Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘He<sup>asws</sup> was asked about a man who bequeathed with ‘something’ from his wealth. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The ‘something’ in the Book of Ali<sup>asws</sup> is (one) from six (1/6)’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from ibn Faddal or others from Jamil from Aban who has narrated the following: “Ali ibn al-Husayn, ‘Alayhim al-Salam, was asked about the case of a man who made a will about something of his legacy. He (the Imam) said, ‘According to the book of Ali, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, it is one-sixth.’”
